body:
Well since im with virgin media (Suppose to be the best in the U.K) its very bad at the moment we are getting rought 2mb download and like 1 mb upload compared to our normal 40mb download and 7mb upload ! Which is making in really impossible to Play Avicus so when its fixed I will try and come on as much as I can now and when its fixed !

Thanks Element.

replies.body:
Provider: Charter
Download: 60.42 Mbps
Upload: 4.37 Mbps
Not bad considering that we can stream Netflix on 8 devices before it starts lagging. Ping is pretty good. It's just that usually 1 time a week the internet is down for about 1-2 hours.
